title: New OCE Streamer
body:
Hey Guys,
My friend is starting out life as a new streamer on the OCE server. He's streaming often and is looking forward to bringing all you guys plenty of brand new LOL content. Check it out a see what it's like, and subscribe if you like what you see.

OptimisticFeeder.
G.A. First Item.

replies.body:
I watched this guys stream 

It was so awesome he was really funny and I recommend to everyone who like awesomeness
